abstracts.cdata!:
The project consists of the: (a) felling
            of timber of TCN over five years from about 17,600 ha of new
            land, and 1,000 ha of land already allocated for settlement,
            in the Terai at Kanchanpur, Bardia and Jhapa; (b) sale of
            logs, followed by sawmilling and sale of logs and lumber as
            well, when sawmills are established by TCN; (c) settlement
            by NSC of about 7,900 families and provision of timely
            availability of cultivable land for about 1,500 more; (d)
            provision of timber extraction and sawmilling equipment,
            farm inputs and settlement infrastructure; (e) technical
            assistance for logging, sawmilling, soil surveys and
            irrigation investigations.

abstracts.cdata!:
The project consists of the: (a) felling
            of timber of TCN over five years from about 17,600 ha of new
            land, and 1,000 ha of land already allocated for settlement,
            in the Terai at Kanchanpur, Bardia and Jhapa; (b) sale of
            logs, followed by sawmilling and sale of logs and lumber as
            well, when sawmills are established by TCN; (c) settlement
            by NSC of about 7,900 families and provision of timely
            availability of cultivable land for about 1,500 more; (d)
            provision of timber extraction and sawmilling equipment,
            farm inputs and settlement infrastructure; (e) technical
            assistance for logging, sawmilling, soil surveys and
            irrigation investigations.
